reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Watson is an amazing professor who genuinely cares about her students. Her lectures are clear, and she is always available for help.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Miller is very knowledgeable and explains concepts well, but his grading can be tough.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's lectures can be a bit dry, but she provides excellent resources for studying.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is very passionate about physics, and it shows in his teaching. His exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Green's lectures are difficult to follow, and she doesn't offer much help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Prof. King is excellent at making complex topics understandable. His classes are engaging and informative.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her subject well, but her lectures are often unstructured and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Turner is very thought-provoking and encourages critical thinking. His classes are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is a wonderful professor who creates a welcoming and inclusive environment. Her classes are very insightful.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's lectures are informative, but his exams are very difficult and require a lot of memorization.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is very approachable and offers great insights into psychology. Her classes are well-organized.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Scott's grading is very harsh, and his feedback is often unclear. The reading load is also heavy.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. White is incredibly knowledgeable and passionate about anthropology. Her classes are fascinating and interactive.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Harris is very experienced in the business world and brings real-life examples to class. His assignments are practical and relevant.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Young is a good professor, but her lectures can be a bit monotonous. She offers a lot of extra credit opportunities, though.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Robinson's teaching style is very fast-paced, and it can be difficult to keep up with the material.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is an expert in linguistics and makes the subject very engaging. Her assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Evans is very passionate about art and brings a lot of enthusiasm to his classes. His exams are straightforward.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Dr. Hall's classes are informative, but her teaching style can be a bit dry. She is very helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Moore encourages deep thinking and philosophical debates. His classes are challenging but rewarding.
